reviews.text: I really enjoy visiting Modling - it has a charming holiday feeling to it. The Babenbergerhof is very well located right next to the restaurants and bars, and there are some good woodland hilly walks to work up an appetite for that Austrian food.
reviews.title: Good location, clean and tidy, enjoyed the bar.

reviews.text: The rooms are a little small, and perhaps need refurbishment (although I understand the rooms in the refurbished wing are really nice). The bar and restaurant are very good.
reviews.title: Very Good
Close to Vienna - Village Location
reviews.text: Compared to some hotels in Gumpoldskirchen 4 miles down the road, I give it 3 stars for the rooms and value, however I would recommend it if being near the bars and restaurants was important.

reviews.title: We often stay at the Babenbergerhof
reviews.text: This place I would recommend to anyone. Reasonably priced with a nice easy going atmosphere. I had single which was small and already populated by an extremely large teddy bear, but it was all i needed. The hotel had building work next door and as a result they had given all guests a small wooden hammer. Although the instructions were in German, the girl behind the bar prompted me for it on ordering my first beer. A free beer a day as compensation for the workmen starting about 7am. Where else have you ever heard of this? Great friendly hotel bar, my only complaint they sell Jagermeister in small miniatures which they ran out of. Probably a good thing as my hangover was huge. Great breakfast buffet, and friendly efficient staff. A good base in a nice town and a easy commute into Vienna.
